segments.text: I don't have my homework today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You usually are good about turning it in ; what happened ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But couldn't you have done it when you felt better ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have already missed one other assignment ; when can I expect the make-ups ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be soon enough , but make sure you get next week's assignment in as well , all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I know that you are capable of being an excellent student .
segments.speaker: S2
